item.title: Read
item.dc:creator: @redneck97 redneck97
item.description:
@redneck97 wrote:

ok add this public void

public void hellcat() { sendFrame126("pet type: hellcat", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); } public void penguin() { sendFrame126("pet type: penguin", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); } public void kbd() { sendFrame126("pet type: kbd", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); } public void shark() { sendFrame126("pet type: shark", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); } public void death() { sendFrame126("pet type: death", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); } public void kolodion() { sendFrame126("pet type: kolodion", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); }

then add these commands

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("penguin")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(131, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; cat(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hellcat")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(3504, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; cat(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dog")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(99, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; rabbit(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shark")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(467, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; shark(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("d3ath")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(2862, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; death(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("910")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(910, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; death(); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("petkit")) { addItem(1759, 1); addItem(327, 1); addItem(1965, 1); addItem(2407, 1); addItem(377, 1); addItem(1929, 1); }

if u want diffrent pets just edit this and add it with ur public void

public void PETNAME() { sendFrame126("pet type: PETNAME", 13589); sendFrame126("pets love"+playerLevel[22], 13590); }

then eddit

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("PETSNAME")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(PETSID#, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; death(); }
